Package pkg_class

Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
pkg_class.UserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
This class is part of the RPandaScape application. RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry area, a text output area, an image and a button.
Version:
2003.01 + 2019 + 2021.01
Author:
Michael Kolling + Elie DUBOUX
See Also:
GameEngine

  • Constructor Details

    • UserInterface

      public UserInterface​(GameEngine pGameEngine, GameModel pGameModel)
      Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine (an object processing and executing the game commands) is needed.
      Parameters:
      pGameEngine - The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
      pGameModel - The GameModel.
